text: Soni Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaagumbile mawunde ni mataka mwakuonaonape, ni (jwagumbile soni) lisiku (lya Kiyama) lyatachiti (pakuchisalila chindu chilichose chachawile): “Syukani!” Basi ni chichisyuka. Maloŵe Gakwe nigagali gakuonaonape. Soni uchimwene uchiŵa Wakwewakwepe lisiku lya lichigombedwa lipenga, Jwakumanyilila yakusisika ni yakuonechela, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwalunda lwakusokoka, Jwaasimanya abali syosope
